name: Login XChange
author: Eric Hamby

sections.description:
This is a full featured plugin to help you edit your login just the way you want it. Lets you use or block the original wordpress
css (the first plugin to do this). Comes with one pre made style you can use or deactivate.
Very easy to create your own style using the style tags givin in the plugin.
Please visit http://vasthtml.com/js/login-xchange-plugin/ for usage instructions.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload login-xchange folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit http://vasthtml.com/js/login-xchange-plugin/ for usage instructions.
sections.faq:
May I recommend some new features?

Yes please do. I offer a forum for such things located here: http://vasthtml.com/support/

Where can I get support?

At the support forums on Vast HTML: http://vasthtml.com/support/

I need some help modifying this. Can you help?

Yes I can. http://vasthtml.com/support/ and let me know what you need.

short_description: This plugin will let you change the css of your login and register pages.
